stable.body:
• Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
• New map list with searching and sorting options
• Show thumbnail of chosen map
• Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
• Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
• More UI improvements
• Some bug fixes
stable.bodyMarkdown:
## Features
- language selection [#33](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/33) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/101530801977d9b7ff87840bbff5cdc26229046e))
- **maps**: multi-selection [#34](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/34) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/01bec65fc220809e6c945557aa2c1527e20192fa))
- add monochrome icon [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/9bbc4c0dc3f7f4fff9f4c4b9b5d24869f4d66a39))
- show progress dialog while doing file operations [#36](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/36) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/f4eac5707b5fb01dc12682f32ac3be280e24aaa7))
- **maps**: ability to duplicate maps [#37](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/37) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/b6efa2ace6ad3d5c9e9dbc8b544a244d3b0846f8))
- various improvements [#39](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/39) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/ebfa8896f6fcf0c6fbe86f00186f6b22e717f712))
- **l10n**: add Polish and Turkish translations [#32](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/32) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/327d8cf20f86cf4f88a530b55a156c8f79bcec58))

## Bug Fixes
- clear map selection on back button click [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/60f62d33c57ae7d4c5fac9c6f6bc5d59ae0d0e10))
- actually open shared files [#38](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/38) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/7722e1d84ed75073599df662d894d268bded415c))

## Continuous Integration
- pass GitHub token for packages [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/ba167ff9cf6a6dfc3098c8f1b205b3970647dbb3))

## Chores
- update dependencies [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/5b8325caf0ecee2446be8e83df0163587907e65b))
- update top-toast, material and material3 [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/df4ad39b98adaf12ddd5429f6ae6b43185a70458))
- update app version to v1.6.0 (16000) [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/b54eb2a07dca907959d5cdfadf5da7b1e44f9846))
- merge branch `dev` into `main` [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/b03cbd322186ddd5975e6e8468a9667efbebfc97))

View this release on [GitHub](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/releases/tag/v1.6.0)

preRelease.body:
• Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
• New map list with searching and sorting options
• Show thumbnail of chosen map
• Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
• Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
• More UI improvements
• Some bug fixes
preRelease.bodyMarkdown:
## Features
- language selection [#33](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/33) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/101530801977d9b7ff87840bbff5cdc26229046e))
- **maps**: multi-selection [#34](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/34) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/01bec65fc220809e6c945557aa2c1527e20192fa))
- add monochrome icon [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/9bbc4c0dc3f7f4fff9f4c4b9b5d24869f4d66a39))
- show progress dialog while doing file operations [#36](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/36) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/f4eac5707b5fb01dc12682f32ac3be280e24aaa7))
- **maps**: ability to duplicate maps [#37](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/37) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/b6efa2ace6ad3d5c9e9dbc8b544a244d3b0846f8))
- various improvements [#39](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/39) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/ebfa8896f6fcf0c6fbe86f00186f6b22e717f712))
- **l10n**: add Polish and Turkish translations [#32](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/32) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/327d8cf20f86cf4f88a530b55a156c8f79bcec58))

## Bug Fixes
- clear map selection on back button click [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/60f62d33c57ae7d4c5fac9c6f6bc5d59ae0d0e10))
- actually open shared files [#38](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/38) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/7722e1d84ed75073599df662d894d268bded415c))

## Continuous Integration
- pass GitHub token for packages [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/ba167ff9cf6a6dfc3098c8f1b205b3970647dbb3))

## Chores
- update dependencies [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([aliernfrog](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/5b8325caf0ecee2446be8e83df0163587907e65b))
- update top-toast, material and material3 [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/df4ad39b98adaf12ddd5429f6ae6b43185a70458))
- update app version to v1.6.0 (16000) [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/b54eb2a07dca907959d5cdfadf5da7b1e44f9846))
- merge branch `dev` into `main` [#35](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/pull/35) ([alieRN](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/b03cbd322186ddd5975e6e8468a9667efbebfc97))

View this release on [GitHub](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/releases/tag/v1.6.0)
